add.title: Approval of Work Contract
add.description: Approval from the Decentralized Administration in Greece.

add.title: Medical Certificate
add.description: Certificate stating you are free from contagious diseases.

steps_flow.title: Employer Applies
steps_flow.description: Employer submits the request to the Decentralized Administration in Greece.

steps_flow.title: Approval
steps_flow.description: Once approved, the decision is forwarded to the Greek Consulate.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a National Visa appointment at the Consulate.

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit documents including the Medical Certificate and PCC.
